sockaddr_in Record

Summary

Represents type sockaddr_in.

Namespace: flcSocketLibSys
Syntax
Delphi
type
 sockaddr_in = record
 case Integer of
 0 : (sin_family : Word;
 sin_port : Word;
 sin_addr : TInAddr;
 sin_zero : array[0..7] of Byte);
 1 : (sa_family : Word;
 sa_data : array[0..13] of Byte);
 end;
